001package org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.core.gen;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
007import org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.core.Resource;
008import org.nasdanika.architecture.cloud.azure.core.ResourceGroup;
009import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
010import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
011import org.nasdanika.html.model.app.Action;
012
013public class ResourceGroupActionBuilder extends AzureElementActionBuilder<ResourceGroup> {
014        
015        public ResourceGroupActionBuilder(ResourceGroup value, Context context) {
016                super(value, context);          
017        }
018                
019        @Override
020        protected Action buildAction(
021                        Action action,
022                        BiConsumer<EObject,Action> registry, 
023                        java.util.function.Consumer<org.nasdanika.common.Consumer<org.nasdanika.html.emf.EObjectActionResolver.Context>> resolveConsumer, 
024                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
025                
026                Action ret = super.buildAction(action, registry, resolveConsumer, progressMonitor);
027                createResourceActions(ret, registry, resolveConsumer, progressMonitor);                                         
028                return ret;
029        }
030        
031        protected void createResourceActions(
032                        Action action,
033                        BiConsumer<EObject,Action> registry, 
034                        java.util.function.Consumer<org.nasdanika.common.Consumer<org.nasdanika.html.emf.EObjectActionResolver.Context>> resolveConsumer, 
035                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
036                
037                List<EObject> children = action.getChildren();
038                for (Resource resource: getTarget().getResources()) {
039                        children.add(createChildAction(resource, registry, resolveConsumer, progressMonitor));
040                }
041        }       
042                
043}
